CdrDoc.CdrDocXml:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:cdr="cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr"> <xsl:output method="text"/>
<!--Filter written by C.Burg - 8/29/2001 --> <!-- This program is a filter to display the health professional titles -->
<!-- Display summary title --> <xsl:template match="Summary"> <xsl:for-each select="SummaryTitle"> <xsl:value-of select="."/>;<xsl:text/> </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="SummaryMetaData"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(SummaryType,';',SummaryAudience)"/> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:transform>
